English.alert_about:
Run Shortcut gives you quick access to your shortcuts from the Notification Center Widget.

You can also run your shortcuts through NoteCuts, allowing it to continue working in the background.
English.alert_updateShortcuts:
A cached list of your shortcuts will now be generated so you can search using your voice or by text input.

Note: If you have a lot of shortcuts installed on your iOS device, this process may take several seconds.
English.alert_welcome:
Run Shortcut gives you quick access to your shortcuts from the Notification Center Widget.

You can also run your shortcuts through NoteCuts, allowing it to continue working in the background
English.alert_welcome_2:
A cached list of your shortcuts will now be generated so you can search using your voice or by text input.

Note: If you have a lot of shortcuts installed on your iOS device, this process may take several seconds.
English.alert_welcome_3:
You can search for shortcuts using keywords. Separate them with new lines. You can also speak or enter the following commands to perform actions within the widget:

• Show All: Show all shortcuts
• Change Mode: Change the Run Mode
• App Settings: Adjust settings for this shortcut
• Change Sort: Set the sort order for displayed shortcuts
English.alert_welcome_4:
NoteCuts monitors changes in shared notes in Apple Notes, Dropbox, and Evernote. You can use it along with third-party integration services like IFTTT and Zapier to automatically run shortcuts in the background from web triggering events.

If you use Run Shortcut Widget with NoteCuts, set the Run Mode to use NoteCuts or Ask When Run.
English.alert_welcome_4_title: Using Run Shortcut Widget with NoteCuts
English.prompt_dictationLanguage: Choose the language used when dictating text.
English.prompt_notecut: Select a local NoteCut that will be used to launch shortcuts.
English.prompt_runMode: Select the action you want to occur when you select a shortcut.
English.prompt_launchSearchType:
Choose search style when opening this shortcut.

Note: If you choose dictation, you can speak the keyword `app settings` to view the Settings page.
English.prompt_parameters: Enter parameters to send to this shortcut.
English.prompt_shortcut_filter: Filter shortcuts with a case-insensitive search.
English.prompt_sort: Choose sort order when displaying shortcuts.
